Title: Silverlight FloatableWindow
Description: A refactoring of Silverlight's ChildWindow control, to enable both modal and non-modal uses, but retain templating and functionality of what the ChildWindow provides.  Also provides start positioning and resizing capabilities.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A refactoring of Silverlight's ChildWindow control, to enable both modal and non-modal uses, but retain templating and functionality of what the ChildWindow provides. Also provides start positioning and resizing capabilities.. ChildWindow is a part of the Silverlight Toolkit project and is also Ms-PL licensed.

Vote for it in the Silverlight Toolkit

If you like this idea and want it to be a part of the toolkit, please consider voting for the work item in the Silverlight Toolkit!

Sample Usage
